name: APPEARANCE
description:
/**
 * Represents the appearance-related activity type.
 *
 * This activity type is used for actions related to changing the appearance settings of the application.
 * It may include changing themes, colors, layouts, or other UI-related settings that affect the look and feel of the application.
 */

name: PROFILE
description:
/**
 * Represents the profile-related activity type.
 *
 * This activity type is used for actions related to updating user profile information. This can include changes to the user's
 * name, contact information, profile picture, and other personal details associated with the user's account.
 */

name: ACCOUNT
description:
/**
 * Represents the account-related activity type.
 *
 * This activity type is used for actions related to account management, such as changing account settings, managing subscriptions,
 * or updating account preferences. It is a broad category encompassing all actions that affect the user's overall account.
 */

name: SECURITY
description:
/**
 * Represents the security-related activity type.
 *
 * This activity type is used for actions related to enhancing or managing the security of the user's account. This includes
 * changing passwords, setting up two-factor authentication, updating security questions, and monitoring login activities.
 */
